subject: VS: firmware issues
description_text:
Hi simsonn,

i have bought a pair of your pedals. whenever i open simsonn manager it says i have an old Version / firmware . when i scan the QR code on the box i comes with this text. SPRO-_V28WF_0324

when i plug the usb in its called SIMSONN v1.7.1

I think i need the right sfu file.

Can you send me this

best regards
Rasmus Holm

conversations.body_text: Hi Rasmus Holm,  Have you downloaded the SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 software? If the interface shows “Version too old, not supported,” please go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware-plus.sfu to update the firmware. Once the update is complete, please be sure to recalibrate the pedals, as they will not function properly in games without calibration.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
